短促.meaning: very brief; pressed for time; short

示威.meaning: demonstrate; put on a show of force; display one's strength

辩护.meaning: speak in defense of; argue in favour of

难能可贵.meaning: deserving praise for one's excellent performance or behaviour; estimable

总之.meaning: in a word; in short; in brief

反感.meaning: be disgusted with; be averse to

勇于.meaning: be brave in; be bold in; have the courage to

名副其实.meaning: be worthy of the name; be worthy of one's reputation

无动于衷.meaning: be completely indifferent; remain completely unmoved

嗨.meaning: [sound used in lyrics for balance or euphony]

丑.meaning: ugly; clown in Beijing opera; the second of the Twelve Earthly Branches

进口.meaning: import; entrance; sail into a port

振奋.meaning: rouse oneself; be inspired with enthusiasm

操心.meaning: to worry about; to take pains over; be concerned over

津津有味.meaning: eat with a gusto; find very interesting

就近.meaning: nearby; in the neighbourhood; without having to go far

反复.meaning: repeatedly; again and again; over and over

层出不穷.meaning: come out in an unending flow

在乎.meaning: care about; mind; take to heart

上游.meaning: head waters; upper reaches (of a river); advanced position

络绎不绝.meaning: come and go in a continuous  stream

发愁.meaning: to worry; to be anxious; sullen

翘.meaning: stick up; bend upwards; curl up

实事求是.meaning: base on facts; be practical and realistic

趁.meaning: to take advantage of; avail oneself of

灭亡.meaning: be destroyed; become extinct; die out

怀念.meaning: cherish the memory of; remember fondly

竭尽全力.meaning: strain every nerve; do all in one's power; do everything one can

随意.meaning: at will; as one pleases; ad lib

称赞.meaning: to praise; to acclaim; to commend

赞助.meaning: support; sponsor; donate money to assist

苦尽甘来.meaning: all sufferings have their reward; after the bitter comes the sweet

上当.meaning: be taken in; be fooled; be duped

对策.meaning: the way to deal with a situation; countermeasure

通缉.meaning: to order the arrest of somebody as criminal

陷入.meaning: sink into; fall into; land oneself in

自主.meaning: act on one's own; decide for oneself

东道主.meaning: host; one who pays for a meal

拜托.meaning: request somebody to do something; entrust

碎.meaning: to break to pieces; smash; fragmentary

锦上添花.meaning: [lit.] onto brocade, add flowers; to add to something that is already perfect [idiom]

理睬.meaning: pay attention to; show interest in; take notice of

万一.meaning: just in case; if by any chance

乘.meaning: to ride on; avail oneself of to multiply

安置.meaning: arrange for; find a place for

顿.meaning: [measure word for occurences, and therefore of meals]

叮嘱.meaning: urge again and again; repeatedly advise; exhort

扛.meaning: lift with both hands; carry on the shoulder

株.meaning: root and stem of a tree; individual plant; plant

目睹.meaning: see with one's own eyes; witness

洽谈.meaning: make arrangements with; talk over with

代表.meaning: to stand for; on behalf of representative

心血.meaning: painstaking care [lit. with the heart's blood]

打交道.meaning: make contact with; have dealings with

当初.meaning: at the beginning; originally; in the first place

熬夜.meaning: to stay up late or all night

忍耐.meaning: exercise patience; restrain oneself; be tolerant of

以往.meaning: before; formerly; previously; in the past

团.meaning: dumpling; [something shaped like a ball]; [measure word for ball-like things]

煎.meaning: pan fry; fry in shallow oil

采购.meaning: procure; make purchases for an organization or enterprise

烘.meaning: dry or warm by the fire

岔.meaning: fork in road; branch off; turn off

捧.meaning: hold or carry in both hands; boost; exalt

热爱.meaning: have deep love for; love heartily

流浪.meaning: roam about; lead a vagrant life

做主.meaning: take the responsibility for a decision

自愿.meaning: of one's own free will; voluntarily

实施.meaning: put into effect; implement; carry out

温柔.meaning: meek; pleasingly affectionate; gentle and soft

有条不紊.meaning: all in good order; methodically; systematically

土地.meaning: territory; local god of the land

潜移默化.meaning: exert a subtle influence on somebody's character

平行.meaning: on an equal footing; parallel; simultaneous

惋惜.meaning: feel sorry for somebody or about something; to pity

动身.meaning: go on a journey; set out on a journey

贷款.meaning: to provide a loan; make an advance to; extend credit to

傍晚.meaning: towards evening; at nightfall; at dusk

无能为力.meaning: helpless; unable to do anything to help

沾光.meaning: benefit from association with somebody or something

停滞.meaning: stagnate; bog down; be at a standstill

一目了然.meaning: be immediately obvious; stick out a mile

储备.meaning: store for future use; lay up; reserve

急功近利.meaning: eager for quick success and instant benefits

扶.meaning: hold up; support with the hand; to  help somebody up

爱不释手.meaning: like something so much that one cannot bear to part with it
